page.title: 01Our D Block
page.content: Our Domesday block lies within the Dee Valley,the river almost at it's journeys end at the North Sea after passing through beautiful Royal Deeside.To the North of the river lie the desirable residential Aberdeen suburbs of Bieldside and Cults.In contrast to the South the land is mainly used for farming.Because of the disirability of the area and the high costs of the houses in Aberdeen the houses in the area are very expensive.The oil industry in the North Sea has brought many newcomers of various nationalities to the area.
